name: Adventist Trail
description:
Join a group of intrepid early Adventists as they make their way across America, spreading their dire warning along the way. As party leader, see if you can shepherd your flock to the end of days! Enter your own names or just press "start" to get a random assortment of real-life members of the Millerite demographic. Get ready to see the States as a Millerite newspaper carrier!Tour cities! Pitch tents! Save souls!

The historical figures in this edutainment game are mentioned for storytelling purposes only. This game is not meant to express any disrespect for the Seventh-Day Adventist Church. This game does not claim to tell an authoritative history of early Adventism; it only tells the story of one of many 19th century American social movements.

***This was made by modifying a javascript browser version of the Oregon Trail***
